casebody.data:
IN RE: HARRIER TRUST NO. 18-CD-1090 Supreme Court of Louisiana. July 13, 2018

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE FOURTEENTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT FOR THE PARISH OF CALCASIEU

PER CURIAM

GRANTED. The "Order Requesting the Supreme Court to Assign an Ad Hoc Judge" is vacated.

Acting pursuant to our supervisory authority under La. Const. art. V, § 5 (A), by separate administrative process and order, this court will appoint an ad hoc judge to hear the pending motion to recuse.

GENOVESE, J., recused.
